channel.title: 👩🏻‍🌾 Athena's Digital Garden on
channel.description: Recent content in 👩🏻‍🌾 Athena's Digital Garden on

item.title: Learn -> Work -> Retirement
item.description: Society has this notion that jobs/careers are life-long. For example, If one wants to be a mechanical engineer, they will spend a chunk of time in their early life learning to be a mechanical engineer.

item.title: Saudade
item.description: Finally found a word to embody the complexity of emotions I feel when I have to separate from a person / place / project.
